00042 extern "C" void uvm_ml_ncsc_quasi_static_startup();
00043 extern "C" void uvm_ml_ncsc_quasi_static_bootstraps();
00044 int uvm_ml_tlm_rec::startup() {
00045     try { 
00046         uvm_ml_ncsc_quasi_static_startup();  
00047     } UVM_ML_CATCH_SC_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_1(UVM_ML_QUASI_STATIC_ELABORATION,0,0,0);
00048     uvm_ml_utils::m_quasi_static_elaboration_started = true;
00049 }
00050 
00051 
00052 #define UVM_ML_CATCH_SC_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_2(n, s1, s2) \
00053 catch( const sc_report& x ) \
00054 { \
00055   uvm_ml_ncsc_print_sc_report_message(x); \
00056   uvm_ml_ncsc_handle_sc_kernel_exception_message(n, s1, s2); \
00057 } \
00058 catch( const ::std::exception& x ) \
00059 { \
00060   ::std::cout << "\n" << ncsc_report_compose_message(x) << ::std::endl; \
00061   uvm_ml_ncsc_handle_sc_kernel_exception_message(n, s1, s2); \
00062 } \
00063 catch( const char* s ) \
00064 { \
00065   ::std::cout << "\n" << s << ::std::endl; \
00066   uvm_ml_ncsc_handle_sc_kernel_exception_message(n, s1, s2); \
00067 } \
00068 catch( ... ) \
00069 { \
00070   ::std::cout << "\n" << "UNKNOWN EXCEPTION OCCURED" << ::std::endl; \
00071   uvm_ml_ncsc_handle_sc_kernel_exception_message(n, s1, s2); \
00072 }

00076 void uvm_ml_tlm_rec::sim_bootstrap() {
00077   try {
00078       uvm_ml_ncsc_quasi_static_bootstraps();
00079   }
00080   UVM_ML_CATCH_SC_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_2(UVM_ML_QUASI_STATIC_ELABORATION, 0, 0)
00081 }

00085 namespace uvm_ml {
00086     bool in_elaboration() { 
00087         void *handle = dlopen(0, RTLD_NOW);
00088         if (handle == NULL) { 
00089             return false; //?
00090         }
00091 
00092         void *function_ptr = dlsym(handle,"udmInit");
00093         
00094         return (function_ptr == NULL); // ncelab doesn't contain udmInit
00095     }
00096 
00097 
00098     void uvm_ml_bootstrap(void* /* scSessionArgumentsT* */ /*sessionArguments*/) {
00099         if (in_elaboration()) return;
00100 
00101         framework_id = uvm_ml_utils::initialize_adapter();
00102         
00103     }

00118 void uvm_ml_tlm_transrec_base::object(sc_object* b) {
00119   sc_module* m;
00120   m_obj = b;
00121   uvm_ml_utils::add_transrec_to_map(m_obj, this);
00122   if (is_transmitter()) {
00123     m = b->get_top_parent_module();
00124     if (m) uvm_ml_utils::register_static_top(m->name());
00125   }
00126 }
00127 
00128 void uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base::bind_export(sc_export_base* b) { 
00129   sc_module* top;
00130   object(b);
00131   m_iface = b->get_interface();
00132   top = b->get_top_parent_module();
00133   uvm_ml_utils::register_static_top(top->name());
00134 }
